data.text: Hiob ɖo eŋu be,
“Va se ɖe ɣe ka ɣie miawɔ funyafunyam
Zi ewo sɔŋue nye esi miedo vlom
Nenye nyateƒee be metra mɔ la,
Nenye vavãe miebe yewoakɔ mia ɖokuiwo ɖe dzi agbɔ tanye,
ekema minyae be Mawu dze agɔ le dzinye
“Togbɔ be mefa avi sesĩe be,
Exe nye mɔ be nyemate ŋu ato edzi ayi o,
Eklo bubu le ŋunye
Evuvum kɔ ɖi le akpa sia akpa va se ɖe esime medzo,
Eƒe dziku bi ɖe ŋunye
Eƒe aʋakɔwo lũ ɖe eme kple ŋusẽ,
“Eɖe nɔvinye ŋutsuwo ɖa le ŋunye
Nye ƒometɔwo dzo le gbɔnye
Ame siwo va dze gbɔnye
Meyɔ nye dɔla gake metɔ o
Nye nu me le ʋeʋẽm ɖe nye ŋutɔ srɔ̃nye
Ŋutsuvi suewo gɔ̃ hã koam eye ne meva do la,
Mele ŋu nyɔm na xɔ̃nye veviwo katã eye ame siwo melɔ̃ la,
Mezu ŋutilã kple ƒu ɖeɖe,
“Mikpɔ nye nublanui, xɔ̃nyewo,
Nu ka ta mieti yonyeme
“O nenye ɖe woaŋlɔ nye nyawo ɖi,
nenye ɖe woatsɔ gayibɔnuŋlɔnu aɖee ɖe akɔblikpe dzi
Menya be nye Xɔnametɔ le agbe,
Eye ne nye ŋutigbalẽ vuvu keŋkeŋkeŋ hã la,
Nye ŋutɔ makpɔe, makpɔe kple nye ŋkuwo,
“Ne miegblɔ be,
ekema yi nedo vɔvɔ̃ na miawo ŋutɔ
